00042 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FLD

00044 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00045 #include <linux/module.h>

00052 static const char fld_index_name[] = "fld";
00053 
00054 static const struct lu_seq_range IGIF_FLD_RANGE = {
00055         .lsr_start = FID_SEQ_IGIF,
00056         .lsr_end   = FID_SEQ_IGIF_MAX + 1,
00057         .lsr_index = 0,
00058         .lsr_flags = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT
00059 };
00060 
00061 static const struct lu_seq_range DOT_LUSTRE_FLD_RANGE = {
00062         .lsr_start = FID_SEQ_DOT_LUSTRE,
00063         .lsr_end   = FID_SEQ_DOT_LUSTRE + 1,
00064         .lsr_index = 0,
00065         .lsr_flags = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT
00066 };
00067 
00068 static const struct lu_seq_range ROOT_FLD_RANGE = {
00069         .lsr_start = FID_SEQ_ROOT,
00070         .lsr_end   = FID_SEQ_ROOT + 1,
00071         .lsr_index = 0,
00072         .lsr_flags = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT
00073 };
00074 
00075 static const struct dt_index_features fld_index_features = {
00076         .dif_flags       = DT_IND_UPDATE,
00077         .dif_keysize_min = sizeof(u64),
00078         .dif_keysize_max = sizeof(u64),
00079         .dif_recsize_min = sizeof(struct lu_seq_range),
00080         .dif_recsize_max = sizeof(struct lu_seq_range),
00081         .dif_ptrsize     = 4
00082 };
00083 
00084 extern struct lu_context_key fld_thread_key;
00085 
00086 int fld_declare_index_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00087                              struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00088                              const struct lu_seq_range *new_range,
00089                              struct thandle *th)
00090 {
00091         struct lu_seq_range     *tmp;
00092         struct lu_seq_range     *range;
00093         struct fld_thread_info  *info;
00094         int                     rc = 0;
00095 
00096         ENTRY;
00097 
00098         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &fld_thread_key);
00099         range = &info->fti_lrange;
00100         tmp = &info->fti_irange;
00101         memset(range, 0, sizeof(*range));
00102 
00103         rc = fld_index_lookup(env, fld, new_range->lsr_start, range);
00104         if (rc == 0) {
00105                 /* In case of duplicate entry, the location must be same */
00106                 LASSERT((lu_seq_range_compare_loc(new_range, range) == 0));
00107                 GOTO(out, rc = -EEXIST);
00108         }
00109 
00110         if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00111                 CERROR("%s: lookup range "DRANGE" error: rc = %d\n",
00112                         fld->lsf_name, PRANGE(range), rc);
00113                 GOTO(out, rc);
00114         }
00115 
00116         /* Check for merge case, since the fld entry can only be increamental,
00117          * so we will only check whether it can be merged from the left. */
00118         if (new_range->lsr_start == range->lsr_end && range->lsr_end != 0 &&
00119             lu_seq_range_compare_loc(new_range, range) == 0) {
00120                 range_cpu_to_be(tmp, range);
00121                 rc = dt_declare_delete(env, fld->lsf_obj,
00122                                        (struct dt_key *)&tmp->lsr_start, th);
00123                 if (rc) {
00124                         CERROR("%s: declare record "DRANGE" failed: rc = %d\n",
00125                                fld->lsf_name, PRANGE(range), rc);
00126                         GOTO(out, rc);
00127                 }
00128                 *tmp = *new_range;
00129                 tmp->lsr_start = range->lsr_start;
00130         } else {
00131                 *tmp = *new_range;
00132         }
00133 
00134         range_cpu_to_be(tmp, tmp);
00135         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, fld->lsf_obj, (struct dt_rec *)tmp,
00136                                (struct dt_key *)&tmp->lsr_start, th);
00137 out:
00138         RETURN(rc);
00139 }
00140 
00160 int fld_index_create(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00161                      const struct lu_seq_range *new_range, struct thandle *th)
00162 {
00163         struct lu_seq_range     *range;
00164         struct lu_seq_range     *tmp;
00165         struct fld_thread_info  *info;
00166         int                     rc = 0;
00167         int                     deleted = 0;
00168         struct fld_cache_entry  *flde;
00169         ENTRY;
00170 
00171         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &fld_thread_key);
00172 
00173         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&fld->lsf_lock));
00174 
00175         range = &info->fti_lrange;
00176         memset(range, 0, sizeof(*range));
00177         tmp = &info->fti_irange;
00178         rc = fld_index_lookup(env, fld, new_range->lsr_start, range);
00179         if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00180                 rc = rc == 0 ? -EEXIST : rc;
00181                 GOTO(out, rc);
00182         }
00183 
00184         if (new_range->lsr_start == range->lsr_end && range->lsr_end != 0 &&
00185             lu_seq_range_compare_loc(new_range, range) == 0) {
00186                 range_cpu_to_be(tmp, range);
00187                 rc = dt_delete(env, fld->lsf_obj,
00188                                (struct dt_key *)&tmp->lsr_start, th);
00189                 if (rc != 0)
00190                         GOTO(out, rc);
00191                 *tmp = *new_range;
00192                 tmp->lsr_start = range->lsr_start;
00193                 deleted = 1;
00194         } else {
00195                 *tmp = *new_range;
00196         }
00197 
00198         range_cpu_to_be(tmp, tmp);
00199         rc = dt_insert(env, fld->lsf_obj, (struct dt_rec *)tmp,
00200                        (struct dt_key *)&tmp->lsr_start, th, 1);
00201         if (rc != 0) {
00202                 CERROR("%s: insert range "DRANGE" failed: rc = %d\n",
00203                        fld->lsf_name, PRANGE(new_range), rc);
00204                 GOTO(out, rc);
00205         }
00206 
00207         flde = fld_cache_entry_create(new_range);
00208         if (IS_ERR(flde))
00209                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(flde));
00210 
00211         write_lock(&fld->lsf_cache->fci_lock);
00212         if (deleted)
00213                 fld_cache_delete_nolock(fld->lsf_cache, new_range);
00214         rc = fld_cache_insert_nolock(fld->lsf_cache, flde);
00215         write_unlock(&fld->lsf_cache->fci_lock);
00216         if (rc)
00217                 OBD_FREE_PTR(flde);
00218 out:
00219         RETURN(rc);
00220 }
00221 
00233 int fld_index_lookup(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00234                      u64 seq, struct lu_seq_range *range)
00235 {
00236         struct lu_seq_range     *fld_rec;
00237         struct fld_thread_info  *info;
00238         int rc;
00239 
00240         ENTRY;
00241 
00242         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &fld_thread_key);
00243         fld_rec = &info->fti_rec;
00244 
00245         rc = fld_cache_lookup(fld->lsf_cache, seq, fld_rec);
00246         if (rc == 0) {
00247                 *range = *fld_rec;
00248                 if (lu_seq_range_within(range, seq))
00249                         rc = 0;
00250                 else
00251                         rc = -ENOENT;
00252         }
00253 
00254         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: lookup seq = "LPX64" range : "DRANGE" rc = %d\n",
00255                fld->lsf_name, seq, PRANGE(range), rc);
00256 
00257         RETURN(rc);
00258 }
00259 
00273 int fld_insert_entry(const struct lu_env *env,
00274                      struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00275                      const struct lu_seq_range *range)
00276 {
00277         struct thandle *th;
00278         int rc;
00279         ENTRY;
00280 
00281         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&fld->lsf_lock));
00282 
00283         th = dt_trans_create(env, lu2dt_dev(fld->lsf_obj->do_lu.lo_dev));
00284         if (IS_ERR(th))
00285                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00286 
00287         rc = fld_declare_index_create(env, fld, range, th);
00288         if (rc != 0) {
00289                 if (rc == -EEXIST)
00290                         rc = 0;
00291                 GOTO(out, rc);
00292         }
00293 
00294         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, lu2dt_dev(fld->lsf_obj->do_lu.lo_dev),
00295                                   th);
00296         if (rc)
00297                 GOTO(out, rc);
00298 
00299         rc = fld_index_create(env, fld, range, th);
00300         if (rc == -EEXIST)
00301                 rc = 0;
00302 out:
00303         dt_trans_stop(env, lu2dt_dev(fld->lsf_obj->do_lu.lo_dev), th);
00304         RETURN(rc);
00305 }
00306 EXPORT_SYMBOL(fld_insert_entry);
00307 
00308 static int fld_insert_special_entries(const struct lu_env *env,
00309                                       struct lu_server_fld *fld)
00310 {
00311         int rc;
00312 
00313         rc = fld_insert_entry(env, fld, &IGIF_FLD_RANGE);
00314         if (rc != 0)
00315                 RETURN(rc);
00316 
00317         rc = fld_insert_entry(env, fld, &DOT_LUSTRE_FLD_RANGE);
00318         if (rc != 0)
00319                 RETURN(rc);
00320 
00321         rc = fld_insert_entry(env, fld, &ROOT_FLD_RANGE);
00322 
00323         RETURN(rc);
00324 }
00325 
00326 int fld_index_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00327                    struct dt_device *dt, int type)
00328 {
00329         struct dt_object        *dt_obj = NULL;
00330         struct lu_fid           fid;
00331         struct lu_attr          *attr = NULL;
00332         struct lu_seq_range     *range = NULL;
00333         struct fld_thread_info  *info;
00334         struct dt_object_format dof;
00335         struct dt_it            *it;
00336         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00337         int                     rc;
00338         __u32                   index;
00339         ENTRY;
00340 
00341         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &fld_thread_key);
00342         LASSERT(info != NULL);
00343 
00344         lu_local_obj_fid(&fid, FLD_INDEX_OID);
00345         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(attr);
00346         if (attr == NULL)
00347                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00348 
00349         memset(attr, 0, sizeof(*attr));
00350         attr->la_valid = LA_MODE;
00351         attr->la_mode = S_IFREG | 0666;
00352         dof.dof_type = DFT_INDEX;
00353         dof.u.dof_idx.di_feat = &fld_index_features;
00354 
00355         dt_obj = dt_locate(env, dt, &fid);
00356         if (IS_ERR(dt_obj)) {
00357                 rc = PTR_ERR(dt_obj);
00358                 dt_obj = NULL;
00359                 GOTO(out, rc);
00360         }
00361 
00362         LASSERT(dt_obj != NULL);
00363         if (!dt_object_exists(dt_obj)) {
00364                 lu_object_put(env, &dt_obj->do_lu);
00365                 dt_obj = dt_find_or_create(env, dt, &fid, &dof, attr);
00366                 fld->lsf_new = 1;
00367                 if (IS_ERR(dt_obj)) {
00368                         rc = PTR_ERR(dt_obj);
00369                         CERROR("%s: Can't find \"%s\" obj %d\n", fld->lsf_name,
00370                                 fld_index_name, rc);
00371                         dt_obj = NULL;
00372                         GOTO(out, rc);
00373                 }
00374         }
00375 
00376         fld->lsf_obj = dt_obj;
00377         rc = dt_obj->do_ops->do_index_try(env, dt_obj, &fld_index_features);
00378         if (rc != 0) {
00379                 CERROR("%s: File \"%s\" is not an index: rc = %d!\n",
00380                        fld->lsf_name, fld_index_name, rc);
00381                 GOTO(out, rc);
00382         }
00383 
00384         range = &info->fti_rec;
00385         /* Load fld entry to cache */
00386         iops = &dt_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00387         it = iops->init(env, dt_obj, 0);
00388         if (IS_ERR(it))
00389                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(it));
00390 
00391         rc = iops->load(env, it, 0);
00392         if (rc < 0)
00393                 GOTO(out_it_fini, rc);
00394 
00395         if (rc > 0) {
00396                 /* Load FLD entry into server cache */
00397                 do {
00398                         rc = iops->rec(env, it, (struct dt_rec *)range, 0);
00399                         if (rc != 0)
00400                                 GOTO(out_it_put, rc);
00401                         LASSERT(range != NULL);
00402                         range_be_to_cpu(range, range);
00403                         rc = fld_cache_insert(fld->lsf_cache, range);
00404                         if (rc != 0)
00405                                 GOTO(out_it_put, rc);
00406                         rc = iops->next(env, it);
00407                 } while (rc == 0);
00408         } else {
00409                 fld->lsf_new = 1;
00410         }
00411 
00412         rc = fld_name_to_index(fld->lsf_name, &index);
00413         if (rc < 0)
00414                 GOTO(out_it_put, rc);
00415         else
00416                 rc = 0;
00417 
00418         if (index == 0 && type == LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT) {
00419                 /* Note: fld_insert_entry will detect whether these
00420                  * special entries already exist inside FLDB */
00421                 mutex_lock(&fld->lsf_lock);
00422                 rc = fld_insert_special_entries(env, fld);
00423                 mutex_unlock(&fld->lsf_lock);
00424                 if (rc != 0) {
00425                         CERROR("%s: insert special entries failed!: rc = %d\n",
00426                                fld->lsf_name, rc);
00427                         GOTO(out_it_put, rc);
00428                 }
00429         }
00430 out_it_put:
00431         iops->put(env, it);
00432 out_it_fini:
00433         iops->fini(env, it);
00434 out:
00435         if (attr != NULL)
00436                 OBD_FREE_PTR(attr);
00437 
00438         if (rc < 0) {
00439                 if (dt_obj != NULL)
00440                         lu_object_put(env, &dt_obj->do_lu);
00441                 fld->lsf_obj = NULL;
00442         }
00443         RETURN(rc);
00444 }
00445 
00446 void fld_index_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_server_fld *fld)
00447 {
00448         ENTRY;
00449         if (fld->lsf_obj != NULL) {
00450                 if (!IS_ERR(fld->lsf_obj))
00451                         lu_object_put(env, &fld->lsf_obj->do_lu);
00452                 fld->lsf_obj = NULL;
00453         }
00454         EXIT;
00455 }
00456 
00457 int fld_server_read(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_server_fld *fld,
00458                     struct lu_seq_range *range, void *data, int data_len)
00459 {
00460         struct lu_seq_range_array *lsra = data;
00461         struct fld_thread_info    *info;
00462         struct dt_object          *dt_obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00463         struct lu_seq_range       *entry;
00464         struct dt_it              *it;
00465         const struct dt_it_ops    *iops;
00466         int                       rc;
00467 
00468         ENTRY;
00469 
00470         lsra->lsra_count = 0;
00471         iops = &dt_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00472         it = iops->init(env, dt_obj, 0);
00473         if (IS_ERR(it))
00474                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(it));
00475 
00476         rc = iops->load(env, it, range->lsr_end);
00477         if (rc <= 0)
00478                 GOTO(out_it_fini, rc);
00479 
00480         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &fld_thread_key);
00481         LASSERT(info != NULL);
00482         entry = &info->fti_rec;
00483         do {
00484                 rc = iops->rec(env, it, (struct dt_rec *)entry, 0);
00485                 if (rc != 0)
00486                         GOTO(out_it_put, rc);
00487 
00488                 if (offsetof(typeof(*lsra), lsra_lsr[lsra->lsra_count + 1]) >
00489                     data_len)
00490                         GOTO(out, rc = -EAGAIN);
00491 
00492                 range_be_to_cpu(entry, entry);
00493                 if (entry->lsr_index == range->lsr_index &&
00494                     entry->lsr_flags == range->lsr_flags &&
00495                     entry->lsr_start > range->lsr_start) {
00496                         lsra->lsra_lsr[lsra->lsra_count] = *entry;
00497                         lsra->lsra_count++;
00498                 }
00499 
00500                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
00501         } while (rc == 0);
00502         if (rc > 0)
00503                 rc = 0;
00504 out:
00505         range_array_cpu_to_le(lsra, lsra);
00506 out_it_put:
00507         iops->put(env, it);
00508 out_it_fini:
00509         iops->fini(env, it);
00510 
00511         RETURN(rc);
00512 }
